name: node-red-contrib-properties
description: Allow configuration of defined node properties at deployment and dynamically through receiving messages. Does not define any node types itself.

scripts.postversion: git push origin && git push --tags && gren release && gren changelog --override && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "Update CHANGELOG" && git push -u origin master && echo "npm publish"

author: s.p.bradley@durham.ac.uk
